    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Argent
    Represents an amount of silver money stored as an item.
    Backpack
    Represents the hero's backpack.
    Combat
    Represents a combat between a hero and multiple enemies.
    CombatState
    Determines Combat State
    Coord
    Position in the game
    Dice
    Generates a random number
    Direction
    The direction that the Hero takes
    Donjon
    Represents the dungeon that the Hero will exxplore
    Effect
    Represents an effect applied by a weapon or item during combat.
    Effect_Aoe
    An area-of-effect attack that damages every enemy in the combat.
    Effect_Atteck
    An attack effect.
    Effect_Backfire
    A risky effect that damages the enemy and also hurts the hero.
    Effect_Charge
    A mana-recovery effect.
    Effect_Def
    A defensive effect that increases the hero's block for the current turn.
    Effect_Heal
    A healing effect that restores health points to the hero.
    Effect_Lifesteal
    An attack effect that also heals the hero by the dealt amount.
    Effect_Puncture
    A chained attack effect.
    Effect_Usemana
     
    Ennemi
    Represents the ennemies that the hero will have to kill
    EnnemisBase
    Static registry of enemy templates used in the game.
    EnnemyActionType
    Defines the ennemy's actions
    Enter
    Represents an action executed when the hero enters a room.
    Enter_Combat
    Enter behavior for enemy rooms.
    Enter_Empty
    Enter behavior for empty rooms.
    Enter_Exit
    Enter behavior for exit rooms.
    Enter_Healer
    Enter behavior for healer rooms.
    Enter_Market
    Enter behavior for merchant rooms.
    Enter_moveEtape
    Enter behavior for gate rooms (used to go to another floor).
    Enter_Tresor
    Enter behavior for treasure rooms.
    Etape
    Represents a single floor (etape) of the dungeon.
    Generation
    Static registry of Ennemies, Weapons, Items, Floors and Dungeons
    Gold
     
    Hero
    Represents the main hero controlled by the player.
    Item
    Base interface for all items that can be stored in the backpack.
    ItemMaldiction
    Represents a curse item placed in the backpack.
    Jeu
     
    Main
     
    Or
    Represents a stack of gold coins as an item.
    Position
    Represents the position of the hero in the dungeon: which floor (etape) and which coordinate in the map.
    Rarity
     
    Room
    Represents a room in a dungeon floor.
    RoomBase
    Registry of room templates used for random floor generation.
    RoomType
     
    Testmain
     
    TheItem
     
    Treasure
     
    Weapon
    Represents a weapon or usable item placed inside the backpack.
    WeaponBase
    Static registry of Weapon
